meanings.sent1: The toy phone he made was the phoniest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Her smile looked the phoniest when she didn't mean it.
meanings.sent3: The phoniest excuse for being late was blaming it on a unicorn sighting.
meanings.sent4: The politician's promises were as phoniest as a mirage in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The phoniest diamond turned out to be a cleverly crafted piece of glass.
